commands.about: Display information about Chandan Kumar Swain.
commands.projects: List all major frontend projects with links.

about.name: Chandan Kumar Swain
about.summary: Self-motivated Frontend Developer skilled in React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Transitioned from a 4-year career in finance, combining analytical and creative skills to build intuitive and high-performance web applications. Currently expanding into backend development to become a full-stack engineer.
about.currentFocus: Learning Node.js and Express to strengthen backend development skills.
about.portfolioTagline: Turning logic into interactive user experiences.

projects.name: Navi Delhi Metro
projects.description: Interactive metro planner that finds the shortest route or minimum interchange between stations using real-time API data.

projects.name: Type-Z
projects.description: Typing speed and accuracy tracker that measures WPM, accuracy, and error rate in real-time.

projects.name: Wordio
projects.description: Smart dictionary and translator app supporting OCR, speech-to-text, and multilingual translation.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
details: Developed and deployed 3+ web apps demonstrating responsive UI and API integration.
Focused on clean component design and efficient state management.

experience.title: Backend Operations Executive
experience.company: First India Group – Channel Partner (Banks and NBFCs)
details: Processed and verified loan applications ensuring 100% compliance.
Maintained data integrity and coordinated with clients and branch teams.

education.institution: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University, Delhi
